structure_analysis.data_structure: Structured JSON with metadata wrapper (hasData, size, columns), values array containing 96 time-series records, and statuses object. Each record contains timestamp and measurement values with status codes.

creation_analysis.notes: Created using Playwright for CEZ PND portal authentication and data extraction as part of PoC comparison. File contains 96 records representing 15-minute intervals over 24 hours (14.02.2026) with power consumption, production, and reactive power measurements from meter ID 784703.

verdict_reason: Evidence file analyzed, structure documented, and creation method determined through git history analysis.
